DataElement.preferredName: Patient Antidepressant Agent Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor CYP1A2 Gene CYP2D6 Gene Inhibitor Use Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator to ask if the patient uses any antidepressant agents, selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors or CYP1A2 and CYP2D6 inhibitors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Antidepressant Agent Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor CYP1A2 Gene CYP2D6 Gene Inhibitor Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A pharmacological agent that acts on neurotransmitter signaling pathways to alleviate the symptoms of depression._Any agent that increases the extracellular level of the neurotransmitter serotonin (5-HT) by inhibiting its reuptake into the presynaptic cell. Increased level in the synaptic cleft prolongs the action of 5-HT on the postsynaptic receptor. This type of agent is typically used as an antidepressant and in the treatment of anxiety disorders and some personality disorders. They are also typically effective and used in treating some cases of insomnia._This gene plays a role in the oxidation/activation of procarcinogens. It is also involved in the metabolism of drugs and other xenobiotics._This gene plays a role in the metabolism of numerous clinically-relevant drugs. It is also involved in the oxidation of xenobiotics._A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target._To put into action or service.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Antidepressant Agent Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor CYP1A2 Gene CYP2D6 Gene Inhibitor Use
Property.preferredDefinition: A drug used to treat depression.:Any agent that increases the extracellular level of the neurotransmitter serotonin (5-HT) by inhibiting its reuptake into the presynaptic cell. Increased level in the synaptic cleft prolongs the action of 5-HT on the postsynaptic receptor. This type of agent is typically used as an antidepressant and in the treatment of anxiety disorders and some personality disorders. They are also typically effective and used in treating some cases of insomnia.:This gene plays a role in the oxidation/activation of procarcinogens. It is also involved in the metabolism of drugs and other xenobiotics.:This gene plays a role in the metabolism of numerous clinically-relevant drugs. It is also involved in the oxidation of xenobiotics.:A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target.:To put into action or service.

Concepts.definition: A pharmacological agent that acts on neurotransmitter signaling pathways to alleviate the symptoms of depression.

Any agent that increases the extracellular level of the neurotransmitter serotonin (5-HT) by inhibiting its reuptake into the presynaptic cell. Increased level in the synaptic cleft prolongs the action of 5-HT on the postsynaptic receptor. This type of agent is typically used as an antidepressant and in the treatment of anxiety disorders and some personality disorders. They are also typically effective and used in treating some cases of insomnia.
This gene plays a role in the oxidation/activation of procarcinogens. It is also involved in the metabolism of drugs and other xenobiotics.
This gene plays a role in the metabolism of numerous clinically-relevant drugs. It is also involved in the oxidation of xenobiotics.
A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target.
To put into action or service.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Any anticipated or concurrent
ReferenceDocuments.description: Any anticipated or concurrent use of any antidepressant or serotonin-altering agent or other potent CYP1A2 and CYP2D6 inhibitors?
